title: Constance Breakwater and Her Beautiful Museumhood
description: Anthony is a teenage boy on holiday in Cornwall with his mum. His dad has stayed back home in London. When there’s a massive terrorist attack in the capital, his dad vanishes and Anthony’s life starts to fall apart.A girl called Patience who’s staying in a nearby chalet comes to Anthony’s rescue. Was his Dad really who he seemed? And could pretty, rich girl Patience actually be the girl of Anthony’s dreams – his imaginary girlfriend Constance Breakwater?Constance Breakwater and her Beautiful Museumhood is aimed at young and old adults alike.
author: Giles Booth
